solution_line_template: 1 hour is {minutes_per_hour} minutes so {planned_hours} hours is {planned_hours}*{minutes_per_hour} = <<{planned_hours}*{minutes_per_hour}={total_planned_minutes}>>{total_planned_minutes} minutes

He spends {minutes_per_page} minutes on 1 page so he will spend {actual_reading_minutes} minutes on {actual_reading_minutes}/{minutes_per_page} = <<{actual_reading_minutes}/{minutes_per_page}={total_pages_read}>>{total_pages_read} pages
